decks.notes: This UR Aggro deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells. By efficiently controlling the board and applying pressure early on, this deck aims to finish the game swiftly before the opponent has a chance to stabilize. With a mix of creatures with evasion and powerful burn spells, this deck looks to maintain tempo and apply consistent pressure to ensure victory._deck utilizes a combination of aggressive creatures and versatile burn spells to quickly establish board control and finish the game.

This UR Aggro deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with a mix of aggressive creatures and powerful spells. With a low mana curve, the deck is able to deploy threats early and maintain pressure throughout the game. Cards like Agatha's Soul Cauldron and Vivi Ornitier provide card advantage and board control, while Winternight Stories and Fear of Missing Out offer direct damage to close out games. The deck includes a mix of disruptive spells like Spell Pierce and removal like Abrade to keep the opponent on the back foot, allowing for a fast and aggressive playstyle.

Fast-paced creature-based deck focused on quickly overwhelming the opponent with a combination of efficient creatures and removal spells. Utilizing a combination of strong early game creatures, discard spells, and efficient beaters like Overlord of the Balemurk, the deck aims to quickly establish board control and pressure the opponent, taking advantage of Golgari's synergy with graveyard interaction and efficient creatures to close out games before the opponent can stabilize.

This deck revolves around utilizing combo pieces such as Omniscience and Roiling Dragonstorm to achieve a powerful board state and overwhelm the opponent. The key strategy involves creating a lock on the opponent's resources using cards like Temporary Lockdown and Ephara's Dispersal while setting up for a massive combo finish with cards like Marang River Regent and Fallaji Archaeologist. The deck aims to control the game through resource manipulation and card advantage until it can unleash a devastating combo to secure victory.

This Dimir Aggro deck focuses on fast and aggressive plays, utilizing a combination of creatures with powerful abilities and disruptive spells to control the game. Cecil, Dark Knight and Kaito, Bane of Nightmares are key threats that can quickly deal damage to the opponent. Gix's Command and Cut Down provide removal options to deal with opposing threats. The deck also includes counterspells like Spell Stutter and Negate to protect your board. Overall, the strategy is to apply pressure early and maintain control of the battlefield to secure a swift victory.
